metadata.title: Portfolio | João Carmassi
metadata.description: Professional portfolio of João Vitor Carmassi, front-end developer specialized in Next and Tailwind CSS.
metadata.keywords: João Vitor Carmassi, web development, frontend development, programming, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind, Sass, Git, Eslint, Redux, Context API, Shadcn/UI, Motion, Mobile first, Scrum, Kanban, games, music, movies, hiking, languages C1 English, B2 Spanish

hero.text1: Crafting seamless web experiences with modern technologies and a passion for innovation.

aboutMe.title: About me

documentos.title: My Portfolio & Achievements
documentos.text: Explore my resumes, certifications, and professional milestones in one place.

docs.title: Cambridge Michigan Language Assessments – MET C1
docs.details: Certified at the C1 Advanced level in English through the Michigan English Test (MET), demonstrating advanced proficiency in reading, writing, listening, and speaking.

docs.title: SIELE – Spanish Proficiency B2
docs.details: Achieved a B2 level in Spanish with the SIELE certification, validating solid communication skills and advanced comprehension in the Spanish language.

resume.title: Professional Resume in English
resume.details: Access my full resume in English, showcasing my skills, projects, and career journey with a global perspective in the tech industry.

cards.text1: Check out various projects—from HTML/CSS basics to Vue and React apps.

contactMe.title: Contact me!
contactMe.text: I’d love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, a project in mind, or just want to connect, feel free to reach out. I’m always open to new opportunities and collaborations.
